track.title: Hashboard
track.subtitle: Explore your payouts, Sharenotes, and hashrate in real time.

pageNotFound: This page could not be found

questions.q: What hardware do I need to get started?
questions.a: Use a Scrypt ASIC for best results. A GPU can run too, but ASIC rigs earn more with the same power.

questions.q: Which payout address can I use?
questions.a: Use an FLC wallet address. That is the only payout option for now; more coins unlock as their payouts go live. Need one? Follow the [[link:twalletGuide]].

questions.q: Which coins do I earn while merge mining?
questions.a: You earn FLC today. More Scrypt coins will unlock as soon as we launch their templates.

questions.q: How does the payout schedule work?
questions.a: We use PPLNS payouts. When a coin matures, you get paid for your valid Sharenotes.

questions.q: How do I track my miners and Sharenotes?
questions.a: Use the Hashboard section above, paste your payout address, and watch live hash rate, rewards, and Sharenotes there.

questions.q: What is a Sharenote and why does it matter?
questions.a: A Sharenote is a signed receipt for each accepted share. Learn more at [[link:shareNote]].

questions.q: How does Sharenote power the Web of Fun (WoF) ecosystem?
questions.a: WoF uses Sharenotes as tickets for social apps, games, and rewards built on provable work. See what your hashpower unlocks at [[link:wofDocs]].

questions.q: Where can I get help or share feedback?
questions.a: Join [[link:discord]], message the community team, file a support ticket, or watch pool announcements for updates.
